features.source_document: GRC_Policy/Policy/Policy Processes and Capabilities/Policy Personal and Commercial Capabilities/PnC Policy Common Functionality/Manage MVR_CLUE reports/UC_Personal Motor_Request MVR_Claims reports/UC_Order report (Policy).md
features.evidence: This business process describes ordering of MVR/CLUE reports from third party system. System checks whether attribute MVRReportInfo.isOrdered is set to 'true' for MVR reports or MotorInsuredInfo.isClueReportsOrdered is true for CLUE reports. System triggers UC>Order report.

features.feature: Retrieve and Validate Existing Report Versions
features.source_document: GRC_Policy/Policy/Policy Processes and Capabilities/Policy Personal and Commercial Capabilities/PnC Policy Common Functionality/Manage MVR_CLUE reports/UC_Personal Motor_Request MVR_Claims reports/UC_Order report (Policy).md
features.evidence: System finds report version that satisfies the following criteria: newest report version exist in registry (current reordered report version < last existed report version) and report expiration date > current date and time. System returns last existed reordered reports in response that satisfy the following criteria: expiration date > current date.
